name: debugging-toolkit
description: AI-assisted debugging with automated root cause analysis, production-safe debugging, and comprehensive observability integration. v1.0.3 features hub-and-spoke architecture with 4 external documentation files, execution modes (quick-triage/standard-debug/deep-rca), YAML frontmatter with time estimates, and 15+ error pattern library for intelligent debugging workflows.
changelog: v1.0.3: Hub-and-spoke architecture implementation with 4 external documentation files (debugging-patterns-library.md 697 lines, rca-frameworks-guide.md 579 lines, observability-integration-guide.md 612 lines, debugging-tools-reference.md 445 lines), execution modes for user control (smart-debug: quick-triage 5-10min, standard-debug 15-30min, deep-rca 30-60min), YAML frontmatter with execution time estimates and external doc references, command optimization (smart-debug: 198→827 lines +318%), enhanced metadata with capabilities and tags, comprehensive debugging patterns library (15 error patterns, 5 hypothesis frameworks, 3 decision trees), RCA frameworks guide (5 methodologies, 2 report templates, case studies), observability integration guide (4 APM platforms, 3 tracing systems, production-safe debugging), debugging tools reference (5 languages, IDE configs, profiling, memory detection). Expected: Better UX with time estimates and mode selection, flexible execution depth, comprehensive reference documentation. v1.0.1: LLM-driven RCA with automated log correlation, observability integration, distributed system debugging, and SRE practices.

agents.name: AI-Assisted Debugger
agents.description: AI-assisted debugging specialist with LLM-driven RCA, error pattern recognition, automated hypothesis generation, and production-safe debugging techniques
agents.improvements: Updated to v1.0.3 for version consistency with plugin. Maintains 91% maturity with comprehensive debugging capabilities including error pattern matching, hypothesis generation frameworks, observability integration, and production-safe debugging techniques. Supports 15 common error patterns, 5 RCA methodologies, and multi-mode execution (quick-triage, standard-debug, deep-rca).

agents.name: Developer Experience Optimizer
agents.description: Developer Experience optimization specialist with systematic 5-step framework, Constitutional AI self-assessment, and comprehensive examples for eliminating friction
agents.improvements: Updated to v1.0.3 for version consistency with plugin. Maintains 85% maturity with systematic DX optimization framework, tooling improvement strategies, and workflow automation capabilities.

commands.name: /smart-debug
commands.description: AI-assisted debugging with automated root cause analysis, error pattern recognition, and intelligent hypothesis generation for production incidents and test failures

execution_modes.quick-triage: 5-10 minutes - Rapid error classification and initial hypothesis generation (steps 1-3)
execution_modes.standard-debug: 15-30 minutes - Complete debugging workflow through fix validation (steps 1-8)
execution_modes.deep-rca: 30-60 minutes - Full RCA with prevention strategy and comprehensive documentation (all 10 steps)

capabilities: Error pattern recognition (15 common patterns: null reference, timeout, memory leak, race condition, deadlock, auth failure, rate limit, JSON parsing, file I/O, infinite loop, SQL injection, type coercion, config errors, async errors, CORS)
AI-powered hypothesis generation with probability scoring (5 frameworks: 5 Whys, Fault Tree Analysis, Timeline Reconstruction, Differential Diagnosis, Ishikawa Fishbone)
Multi-strategy debugging (interactive, observability-driven, time-travel, chaos engineering, statistical)
Observability integration (Datadog, New Relic, Prometheus, AWS X-Ray, Sentry, Jaeger, Zipkin, OpenTelemetry)
Production-safe debugging (feature flags, dark launches, sampling, dynamic logging, read-only endpoints, gradual traffic shifting)
Automated RCA report generation with 5 methodologies
Fix implementation with impact assessment and risk scoring
Prevention strategy (regression tests, monitoring, runbooks, coding standards)
Support for Python, Node.js, Go, Rust, Java debugging

skills.name: AI-Assisted Debugging
skills.description: LLM-driven stack trace analysis, automated debug statement insertion, ML-based log anomaly detection, Kubernetes/Docker debugging, and automated RCA pipelines with comprehensive use case coverage
skills.improvements: Updated to v1.0.3 for version consistency with plugin. Enhanced with references to external documentation (debugging patterns library, RCA frameworks guide, observability integration guide, debugging tools reference).

skills.name: Debugging Strategies
skills.description: Systematic debugging methodologies, profiling tools (cProfile, py-spy, Chrome DevTools), git bisect, differential debugging, and root cause analysis across all technology stacks
skills.improvements: Updated to v1.0.3 for version consistency with plugin. Enhanced with comprehensive error pattern matching, decision trees for strategy selection, and integration with external documentation.

skills.name: Observability & SRE Practices
skills.description: OpenTelemetry implementation, Prometheus metrics/alerting, SLO/SLI monitoring, incident management, Golden Signals, distributed tracing, and production observability practices
skills.improvements: Updated to v1.0.3 for version consistency with plugin. Enhanced with production-safe debugging techniques (feature flags, dark launches, sampling, dynamic logging) and comprehensive APM integration guides.

files.name: debugging-patterns-library.md
files.description: Common error patterns (15 patterns with signatures, causes, detection strategies, fix patterns), hypothesis generation frameworks (5 Whys, Fault Tree Analysis, Timeline Reconstruction, Differential Diagnosis, Ishikawa Fishbone), debugging decision trees (error origin, performance issues, data integrity), code smell detection (God object, deep nesting, magic numbers, long parameters, duplication), before/after debugging examples (N+1 queries, memory leaks, race conditions, unhandled promises, SQL injection)

files.name: rca-frameworks-guide.md
files.description: RCA methodologies (5 Whys, Fishbone Diagram, Fault Tree Analysis, Timeline Reconstruction, DMAIC), RCA report templates (executive summary format, technical deep-dive format), timeline reconstruction techniques (multi-system log aggregation, distributed tracing analysis, metric correlation), contributing factors identification (technical, process, human factors), prevention strategy formulation (defense in depth, SMART action items, continuous improvement), comprehensive case studies (e-commerce checkout outage, authentication service cascade failure)

files.name: observability-integration-guide.md
files.description: APM integration (Datadog, New Relic, Prometheus+Grafana, AWS X-Ray with setup, instrumentation, error tracking, profiling), distributed tracing setup (OpenTelemetry, Jaeger, Zipkin with configuration, manual instrumentation, context propagation), logging best practices (structured logging, log aggregation with ELK, log levels), monitoring dashboards and alerting (Grafana configuration, Prometheus alert rules), production-safe debugging techniques (feature flags, dark launches, dynamic log level adjustment, conditional debugging, sampling/profiling), observability tool comparison matrix

files.name: debugging-tools-reference.md
files.description: Language-specific debugging tools (Python: pdb/ipdb/pudb/debugpy, Node.js: inspector/ndb, Go: delve, Rust: rust-gdb/rust-lldb, Java: jdb), IDE debugger configurations (VS Code, JetBrains IDEs for Python/Node.js/Go), performance profiling tools (Python: cProfile/line_profiler/py-spy, Node.js: built-in profiler/clinic.js, Go: pprof), memory leak detection (Python: memory_profiler/objgraph, Node.js: heap snapshots/memwatch, Go: heap analysis), network debugging tools (tcpdump, Wireshark, curl timing), tool selection matrices (debugger, profiler, memory leak detection), installation checklist
